title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling AI with confidence: From proof of concept to production (AIM209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 充满信心地扩展AI：从概念验证到生产环境 (AIM209)
abstract: From a proof of concept to scaling AI for top U.K. insurance brands, CDL’s journey highlights the challenges of deploying AI at scale while staying compliant, cost-effective, and trustworthy. This session covers their use of observability to track performance and risks, building guardrails for safe AI outputs, and strategies to scale without compromising cost, quality, or governance. Learn key lessons about the people and processes behind successful AI adoption. If you’re looking for practical insights to turn AI ideas into real impact, don’t miss this session.  This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 从概念验证到为英国顶级保险品牌扩展AI，CDL的历程突出了在保持合规、成本效益和可信度的同时大规模部署AI的挑战。本次会议涵盖他们使用可观测性来跟踪性能和风险、构建安全AI输出的护栏，以及在不影响成本、质量或治理的情况下扩展的策略。了解成功采用AI背后的人员和流程的关键经验。如果您正在寻找将AI想法转化为实际影响的实用见解，请不要错过这次会议。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Dynatrace为您呈现。
